headline: A Look At Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) Valuation After A Strong Year Of Shareholder Returns
summary: Setting the scene on Martin Marietta Materials Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) has quietly posted a mix of short term pullbacks and longer term gains, leaving investors weighing its recent share performance, profitability and growth against the current price level. See our latest analysis for Martin Marietta Materials.
